document.full_text: hall of famer harmon killebrew died monday at 74 from esophageal cancer. he hit 573 career home runs, but had the ego of a batboy.
document.title: appreciation: harmon killebrew recalled as great player, person
lines_and_colors: hall of famer harmon killebrew died monday at 74 from esophageal cancer. he hit 573 career home runs, but had the ego of a batboy.
